name: I AM RABBIT
description:
Embark on a whimsical lunar adventure as Mr. Rabbit in a quest to save his family from a carrot crisis!
Traverse captivating landscapes from forests to cities, seas, skies, and even the moon itself.
Enjoy charming low-polygon graphics and overcome cunning traps along the way.
Will you guide Mr. Rabbit safely and bring the precious carrots back home?
Find out in this delightful game filled with heartwarming challenges and captivating visuals.
Join the adventure and help Mr. Rabbit reunite his happy rabbit family on the moon!


PLAY POINT
1. Traverse captivating landscapes from forests to cities, seas, skies, and even the moon itself !
2. Enjoy charming low-polygon graphics !
3. Overcome challenging traps !
